title: Collective
creator_credit: Samsa Film, Alexander Nanau Production, HBO Europe, MDR, Centrul National al Cinematografiei (CNC), Luxembourg Film Fund, Sundance Institute Documentary Fund, Magnolia Pictures, Bernard Michaux, Bianca Oana, Alexander Nanau, Hanka Kastelicová and Antoaneta Opris
brief_description: In the aftermath of a tragic fire in a Romanian club, burn victims begin dying in hospitals from wounds that were not life threatening. A team of investigative journalists move into action uncovering the mass corruption of the health system and of the state institutions. Collective follows journalists, whistle blowers, and authorities alike. An immersive and uncompromising look into a dysfunctional system, exposing corruption, propaganda, and manipulation that nowadays affect not only Romania, but societies around the world.

constellations_primary.name: Collective: investigative journalism on screen
constellations_primary.description: In Collective, documentarian Alexander Nanau follows a team of journalists who uncover a far-reaching government conspiracy following a deadly nightclub fire in Romania that kills dozens.
